Name: Drama
Description: Should contain numerous consecutive scenes of characters portrayed to effect a serious narrative throughout the title. This can be exaggerated upon to produce a melodrama. Subjective.

Name: Comedy
Description: Comedy is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humor. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect.

Name: Romantic Comedy
Description: A romantic comedy film should just be classified as comedy however society likes to classify things that donâ€™t always require a new classification.  Romantic comedies typically have an undercurrent or secondary story line that is romantic in nature, making these comedies 'Romantic Comedies' and often branded as comedy for females.
